events.24: Active elite jōnin; “White Fang” reputation growing
events.26: Frontline legend vs rival nations; clashes with Hanzō’s sphere
events.27: Strategic raids; saves squads at cost of overextension
events.29: Noted engagement touching Hanzo’s influence; decisive strike
events.31: Mission choice scandal; village censure begins

events.7: Enters advanced training; noted by Jiraiya
events.8: Early field experience; shows teleportation aptitude
events.9: Trains under Jiraiya; develops Flying Thunder God fundamentals
events.12: Becomes jōnin; mentors younger genin informally
events.13: Leads special ops; future Team Minato forms
events.16: Field leader reputation rises; FTG becomes signature
events.17: High-impact covert strikes; gains “Yellow Flash” renown
events.18: Promoted to key command; ANBU coordination
events.19: Continues black-ops excellence; mentor to Kakashi intensifies
events.20: Pre-war deterrence missions; diplomacy via force projection
events.21: Operations on multiple fronts; Team Minato battle-ready
events.22: Leads Team Minato in Third War; Kannabi/bridge ops era
events.23: Becomes Fourth Hokage; Nine-Tails attack → Dies sealing

events.37: Fails to defend Sakumo from village backlash (political bind)
events.38: Quietly devastated; redoubles mentorship of next gen
events.39: Hokage crisis management; keeps peace tenuous
events.42: Confronts Orochimaru in lab; fails to execute him
events.47: Resumes as Hokage after Minato’s death
events.50: Continues Hokage stewardship; watches new generation

events.18: Promising jōnin under Hiruzen; research interest begins
